unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! It's vehicle launch season, and things are heating up faster than a Delhi summer! We've been seeing launches left, right, and center, from budget-friendly hatchbacks to luxury SUVs that cost more than my entire ancestral home!
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! It's vehicle launch season, and things are heating up faster than a Delhi summer! We've been seeing launches left, right, and center, from budget-friendly hatchbacks to luxury S U Vs that cost more than my entire ancestral home!

unnormalised: First off, Tata Motors just dropped the new Altroz Racer in Mumbai. Boy, does she look sporty! They're claiming a 0-100 kmph time that'll leave you breathless, probably somewhere around the Bandra-Worli Sea Link. The price point is competitive too, starting around Rs. 8.49 Lakhs. Expect a lot of "kitna deti hai?" conversations around this one.
normalised: First off, Tata Motors just dropped the new Altroz Racer in Mumbai. Boy, does she look sporty! They're claiming a zero to one hundred kilometer per hour time that'll leave you breathless, probably somewhere around the Bandra-Worli Sea Link. The price point is competitive too, starting around rupee eight point four nine lakhs. Expect a lot of "kitna deti hai?" conversations around this one.

unnormalised: Then there's Mahindra, who unveiled their XUV700 facelift in Pune. The interiors got a major upgrade, with a massive touchscreen display – apparently, it's bigger than my auntie’s TV! Dr. Sharma from ARAI was spotted giving it a once-over, so you know it's legit.
normalised: Then there's Mahindra, who unveiled their X U V seven hundred facelift in Pune. The interiors got a major upgrade, with a massive touchscreen display – apparently, it's bigger than my auntie's T V! Doctor Sharma from A R A I was spotted giving it a once-over, so you know it's legit.

unnormalised: And don’t even get me started on the electric vehicle space. Ola Electric is planning a new scooter factory in Tamil Nadu, sprawling across a whopping 100 sq ft (okay, maybe I exaggerated a little!). They're promising faster charging times and longer range, which is crucial if you're planning a road trip from Bangalore to Chennai in an EV.
normalised: And don't even get me started on the electric vehicle space. Ola Electric is planning a new scooter factory in Tamil Nadu, sprawling across a whopping one hundred square feet (okay, maybe I exaggerated a little!). They're promising faster charging times and longer range, which is crucial if you're planning a road trip from Bangalore to Chennai in an E V.

unnormalised: But the launch that’s really got everyone buzzing is the upcoming Maruti Suzuki Jimny 5-door. Everyone’s been waiting for this! It’s like the perfect vehicle for navigating those crazy Bangalore traffic jams and tackling those weekend trips to Coorg.
normalised: But the launch that's really got everyone buzzing is the upcoming Maruti Suzuki Jimny five-door. Everyone's been waiting for this! It's like the perfect vehicle for navigating those crazy Bangalore traffic jams and tackling those weekend trips to Coorg.

unnormalised: So, there you have it – a whirlwind tour of the latest vehicle launches. Keep your eyes peeled for more updates, and remember to drive safe (and wear your seatbelt, unlike Raju bhaiyya!). Happy motoring, everyone!
normalised: So, there you have it – a whirlwind tour of the latest vehicle launches. Keep your eyes peeled for more updates, and remember to drive safe (and wear your seatbelt, unlike Raju bhaiyya!). Happy motoring, everyone!
